full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA BSHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YID DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA PHAN MTHONG NAS, RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING LIG RNYING GI DGOS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, SNA TSOGS DA BYIG CES PA SHING MO SPRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WANG RATNA SIDDHI PO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGA' BGYIS PA'O, ,)
